name: Horrid Henry: The Good, The Bad & The Bugly
name_original: Horrid Henry: The Good, The Bad & The Bugly
description:
Horrid Henry: The Good, The Bad & The Bugly is an arcade game developed by Asylum entertainment. It came out on 25-11-2011. It was published by Asylum Entertainment.
You can play Horrid Henry: The Good, The Bad & The Bugly on Nintendo 3DS.
